appearance.description: The appearance of the toggle button when `selected` is true.

onChange.description: Callback fired when the toggle button's selection state is changed.

readOnly.description: If `true`, the toggle button will be read-only.

sentiment.description: The sentiment of the toggle button.

selected.description: Whether the toggle button is in a selected state.

defaultSelected.description:
Whether the toggle button is selected by default.
This will be disregarded if `selected` is already set.

value.description: Value of the toggle button, to be used when in a controlled state.
